trans-unit.source: Install bootstrap as a Node.js module using npm.
trans-unit.target: 使用npm 将引导程序安装为Node.js模块。

trans-unit.source: Tooltips and popovers can be placed within modals as needed. When modals are closed, any tooltips and popovers within are also automatically dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据需要将工具提示和弹出窗口放置在模态中。关闭模态后，其中的所有工具提示和弹出窗口也将自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: Download and install Node.js, which we use to manage our dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 下载并安装Node.js，我们将使用它来管理依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Install Ruby, install Bundler with gem install bundler, and finally run bundle install. This will install all Ruby dependencies, such as Jekyll and plugins.
trans-unit.target: 安装Ruby，使用 gem install bundler 安装Bundler，最后运行 bundle install 。这将安装所有Ruby依赖项，例如Jekyll和插件。

trans-unit.target: !important 也可以添加到您想要的任何值：

trans-unit.source: <a>s don’t support the disabled attribute, so you must add the .disabled class to make it visually appear disabled.
trans-unit.target: <a> 不支持 disabled 属性，因此您必须添加 .disabled 类以使其在外观上显示为禁用。

trans-unit.source: <button>s and <input> button elements have cursor: pointer when :not(:disabled).
trans-unit.target: <button> s和 <input> 按钮元素在 :not(:disabled) 时具有 cursor: pointer 。

trans-unit.source: <fieldset>s have no borders, padding, or margin so they can be easily used as wrappers for individual inputs or groups of inputs.
trans-unit.target: <fieldset> 没有边界，填充或边距，因此它们可以轻松用作单个输入或一组输入的包装。

trans-unit.source: <input>s and <textarea>s with .form-control (including up to one .form-control in input groups)
trans-unit.target: <input> 具有 .form-control 的<input>和 <textarea> （在输入组中最多包含一个 .form-control ）

trans-unit.source: <input>s, <select>s, <textarea>s, and <button>s are mostly addressed by Normalize, but Reboot removes their margin and sets line-height: inherit, too.
trans-unit.target: <input> s， <select> s， <textarea> s和 <button> s通常由Normalize解决，但是Reboot删除了它们的 margin 并设置 line-height: inherit 也。

trans-unit.source: <label>s are set to display: inline-block to allow margin to be applied.
trans-unit.target: <label> 设置为 display: inline-block 以允许应用 margin 。

trans-unit.source: <legend>s, like fieldsets, have also been restyled to be displayed as a heading of sorts.
trans-unit.target: <legend> 与字段集一样，<legend>也已重新设置样式以显示为各种标题。

trans-unit.source: <mark> represents text which is marked or highlighted for reference or notation purposes.
trans-unit.target: <mark> 表示标记或突出显示的文本，以供参考或标记。

trans-unit.source: <s> represents element that are no longer relevant or no longer accurate.
trans-unit.target: <s> 表示不再相关或不再准确的元素。

trans-unit.source: <select>s with .form-control or .custom-select
trans-unit.target: <select> 与 .form-control 或 .custom-select 一起使用

trans-unit.source: <small> represents side-comments and small print, like copyright and legal text.
trans-unit.target: <small> 表示旁注和小字体，例如版权和法律文本。

trans-unit.source: <textarea>s are modified to only be resizable vertically as horizontal resizing often “breaks” page layout.
trans-unit.target: <textarea> 修改为只能垂直调整大小，因为水平调整大小通常会“破坏”页面布局。

trans-unit.source: <u> represents a span of inline text which should be rendered in a way that indicates that it has a non-textual annotation.
trans-unit.target: <u> 表示嵌入式文本的范围，该范围应以指示其具有非文本注释的方式呈现。

trans-unit.source: 'hover' on its own will result in tooltips that cannot be triggered via the keyboard, and should only be used if alternative methods for conveying the same information for keyboard users is present.
trans-unit.target: 'hover' 单独的“悬停”将导致无法通过键盘触发工具提示，只有在存在用于为键盘用户传达相同信息的替代方法时，才应使用“工具提示”。

trans-unit.source: 'manual' indicates that the tooltip will be triggered programmatically via the .tooltip('show'), .tooltip('hide') and .tooltip('toggle') methods; this value cannot be combined with any other trigger.
trans-unit.target: 'manual' 表示该工具提示将编程经由触发 .tooltip('show') ， .tooltip('hide') 和 .tooltip('toggle') 的方法; 该值不能与任何其他触发器结合使用。

trans-unit.source: .arrow will become the popover's arrow.
trans-unit.target: .arrow 将成为弹出框的箭头。

trans-unit.source: .arrow will become the tooltip's arrow.
trans-unit.target: .arrow 将成为工具提示的箭头。

trans-unit.source: .badge-default has been dropped and .badge-secondary added to match component modifier classes used elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: .badge-default 并添加了 .badge-secondary 以匹配其他地方使用的组件修饰符类。

trans-unit.target: .card-img-top 将图像放置在卡的顶部。使用 .card-text ，可以将文本添加到卡中。内文 .card-text 也可以用标准的HTML标签的样式。

trans-unit.target: .collapse.navbar-collapse 用于按父断点分组和隐藏导航栏内容。

trans-unit.target: .dl-horizontal 已被删除。而是在 <dl> 上使用 .row 并在其 <dt> 和 <dd> 子级上使用网格列类（或mixins）。

trans-unit.target: .form-checks

trans-unit.source: .form-group no longer applies styles from the .row via mixin, so .row is now required for horizontal grid layouts (e.g., <div class="form-group row">).
trans-unit.target: .form-group 不再通过mixin 应用 .row 中的样式，因此现在水平网格布局需要 .row （例如， <div class="form-group row"> ）。

trans-unit.source: .form-inline for any form controls and actions.
trans-unit.target: .form-inline 用于任何表单控件和动作。

trans-unit.target: .g-* 类可用于控制水平装订线宽度，在以下示例中，我们使用较小的装订线宽度，因此无需添加 .overflow-hidden 包装器类。

trans-unit.source: .gx-* classes can be used to control the horizontal gutter widths. The .container or .container-fluid parent may need to be adjusted if larger gutters are used too to avoid unwanted overflow, using a matching padding utility. For example, in the following example we’ve increased the padding with .px-4:
trans-unit.target: .gx-* 类可用于控制水平装订线的宽度。所述 .container 或 .container-fluid 父母可能需要调整，如果较大的沟使用太以避免不希望的溢出，使用匹配填充效用。例如，在下面的示例中，我们增加了 .px-4 的填充：

trans-unit.source: .gy-* classes can be used to control the vertical gutter widths. Like the horizontal gutters, the vertical gutters can cause some overflow below the .row at the end of a page. If this occurs, you add a wrapper around .row with the .overflow-hidden class:
trans-unit.target: .gy-* 类可用于控制垂直装订线的宽度。像水平 .row 一样，垂直装订线会导致页面末尾.row下方的某些溢出。如果发生这种情况，你加一个包装周围 .row 与 .overflow-hidden 类：

trans-unit.source: .h1 through .h6 classes are also available, for when you want to match the font styling of a heading but cannot use the associated HTML element.
trans-unit.target: .h1 到 .h6 的类也可用，当您想匹配标题的字体样式但不能使用关联的HTML元素时。

trans-unit.source: .item is also now .carousel-item.
trans-unit.target: .item 现在也是 .carousel-item 。

trans-unit.source: .list-inline now requires that its children list items have the new .list-inline-item class applied to them.
trans-unit.target: .list-inline 现在要求其子级列表项具有新的 .list-inline-item 类。

trans-unit.source: .mark and .small classes are also available to apply the same styles as <mark> and <small> while avoiding any unwanted semantic implications that the tags would bring.
trans-unit.target: .mark 和 .small 类还可用于应用与 <mark> 和 <small> 相同的样式，同时避免标签会带来任何不必要的语义影响。

trans-unit.source: .mark will apply the same styles as <mark>.
trans-unit.target: .mark 将采用与 <mark> 相同的样式。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-brand for your company, product, or project name.
trans-unit.target: .navbar-brand 您公司，产品或项目名称的.navbar品牌。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-default is now .navbar-light, though .navbar-dark remains the same. One of these is required on each navbar. However, these classes no longer set background-colors; instead they essentially only affect color.
trans-unit.target: .navbar-default 现在是 .navbar-light ，尽管 .navbar-dark 保持不变。每个导航栏上都需要其中之一。但是，这些类不再设置 background-color 。相反，它们基本上只影响 color 。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-nav for a full-height and lightweight navigation (including support for dropdowns).
trans-unit.target: .navbar-nav 用于全高和轻量级导航（包括对下拉菜单的支持）。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-text for adding vertically centered strings of text.
trans-unit.target: .navbar-text 用于添加垂直居中的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-toggle is now .navbar-toggler and has different styles and inner markup (no more three <span>s).
trans-unit.target: .navbar-toggle 现在是 .navbar-toggler ，具有不同的样式和内部标记（不再有三个 <span> ）。

trans-unit.source: .navbar-toggler for use with our collapse plugin and other navigation toggling behaviors.
trans-unit.target: .navbar-toggler ，用于我们的合拢插件和其他导航切换行为。

trans-unit.source: .panel-body to .card-body
trans-unit.target: .panel-body 至 .card-body

trans-unit.source: .panel-default removed and no replacement.
trans-unit.target: .panel-default 已删除，无法替代。

trans-unit.source: .panel-footer to .card-footer
trans-unit.target: .panel-footer 至 .card-footer

trans-unit.target: .panel-group 已删除，无法替换。 .card-group 不是替代品，它是不同的。

trans-unit.source: .panel-heading to .card-header
trans-unit.target: .panel-heading 到 .card-header

trans-unit.source: .panel-primary, .panel-success, .panel-info, .panel-warning, and .panel-danger have been dropped for .bg-, .text-, and .border utilities generated from our $theme-colors Sass map.
trans-unit.target: .panel-primary ， .panel-success ， .panel-info ， .panel-warning 和 .panel-danger 已经降到了 .bg- ， .text- 和 .border 从我们产生水电费 $theme-colors 萨斯地图。

trans-unit.source: .panel-title to .card-title. Depending on the desired look, you may also want to use heading elements or classes (e.g. <h3>, .h3) or bold elements or classes (e.g. <strong>, <b>, .font-weight-bold). Note that .card-title, while similarly named, produces a different look than .panel-title.
trans-unit.target: .panel-title 到 .card-title 。根据所期望的外观，还可能想要使用标题元素或类（例如 <h3> ， .h3 ）或粗体的元件或类（例如 <strong> ， <b> ， .font-weight-bold ）。请注意， .card-title 相似，但其外观与 .panel-title 的外观不同。

trans-unit.source: .panel to .card, now built with flexbox.
trans-unit.target: .panel 到 .card ，现在使用flexbox构建。

trans-unit.source: .popover-arrow will become the popover's arrow.

trans-unit.source: const bootstrap = require('bootstrap') or import bootstrap from 'bootstrap' will load all of Bootstrap’s plugins onto a bootstrap object. The bootstrap module itself exports all of our plugins. You can manually load Bootstrap’s plugins individually by loading the /js/dist/*.js files under the package’s top-level directory.

trans-unit.source: Alignment and spacing:
trans-unit.target: 对齐和间距：

trans-unit.source: Be sure to include text for screen readers, as we’ve done with aria-label.
trans-unit.target: 与 aria-label 一样，请确保为屏幕阅读器添加文字。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap does not officially support third-party JavaScript libraries like Prototype or jQuery UI. Despite .noConflict and namespaced events, there may be compatibility problems that you need to fix on your own.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap并未正式支持 Prototype或jQuery UI等第三方JavaScript库。尽管存在 .noConflict 和命名空间事件，但仍可能需要自己解决兼容性问题。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes predefined classes for creating fast, responsive layouts. With six breakpoints and a dozen columns at each grid tier, we have dozens of classes already built for you to create your desired layouts. This can be disabled via Sass if you wish.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包含用于创建快速响应式布局的预定义类。随着6个断点在每个网格层和十几个栏目，我们有几十个班已建成，为您打造您所需的布局。如果愿意，可以通过Sass禁用它。

trans-unit.source: Breakpoints are the building blocks of responsive design. Use them to control when your layout can be adapted at a particular viewport or device size.
trans-unit.target: 断点是响应式设计的基石。使用它们来控制何时可以在特定视口或设备尺寸上调整布局。

trans-unit.source: Columns are incredibly flexible. There are 12 template columns available per row, allowing you to create different combinations of elements that span any number of columns. Column classes indicate the number of template columns to span (e.g., col-4 spans four). widths are set in percentages so you always have the same relative sizing.
trans-unit.target: 列非常灵活。每行有12个模板列，可让您创建跨越任意数量列的元素的不同组合。列类指示要跨越的模板列数（例如 col-4 跨越四）。 width s以百分比设置，因此您始终具有相同的相对大小。

trans-unit.source: Columns build on the grid’s flexbox architecture. Flexbox means we have options for changing individual columns and modifying groups of columns at the row level. You choose how columns grow, shrink, or otherwise change.
trans-unit.target: 列建立在网格的flexbox体系结构上。Flexbox意味着我们具有在行级别更改单个列和修改列组的选项。您可以选择列的增长，收缩或其他更改方式。

trans-unit.source: Containers center and horizontally pad your content. Use .container for a responsive pixel width, .container-fluid for width: 100% across all viewports and devices, or a responsive container (e.g., .container-md) for a combination of fluid and pixel widths.
trans-unit.target: 容器居中并水平填充内容。将 .container 用于响应性像素宽度，将 .container-fluid 用于 width: 100% 在所有视口和设备上均为100％，或将响应性容器（例如 .container-md ）用于流体和像素宽度的组合。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated
trans-unit.target: Deprecated

trans-unit.source: Display, hidden, and more:
trans-unit.target: 显示，隐藏等：

trans-unit.source: Dropped panels, thumbnails, and wells for a new all-encompassing component, cards.
trans-unit.target: 放下面板，缩略图和小孔，以放置新的无所不包的组件卡。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the Affix jQuery plugin.
trans-unit.target: 删除了Affix jQuery插件。

trans-unit.source: Dropped the Glyphicons icon font. If you need icons, some options are:
trans-unit.target: 删除了Glyphicons图标字体。如果需要图标，则一些选项为：

trans-unit.source: Dropped the pager component as it was essentially slightly customized buttons.
trans-unit.target: 删除了寻呼机组件，因为它实际上是稍微自定义的按钮。

trans-unit.source: First, we decided to build it with the RTLCSS project. This gives us some powerful features for managing changes and overrides when moving from LTR to RTL. It also allows us to build two versions of Bootstrap from one codebase.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们决定使用RTLCSS项目进行构建。这为我们提供了一些强大的功能，用于管理从LTR到RTL时的更改和替代。它还允许我们从一个代码库构建Bootstrap的两个版本。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox is enabled by default. In general this means a move away from floats and more across our components.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Flexbox已启用。总的来说，这意味着要远离浮标，而要跨越我们的组件。

trans-unit.source: Gutters are also responsive and customizable.Gutter classes are available across all breakpoints, with all the same sizes as our margin and padding spacing. Change horizontal gutters with .gx-* classes, vertical gutters with .gy-*, or all gutters with .g-* classes. .g-0 is also available to remove gutters.
trans-unit.target: 装订线也可以响应并可以自定义。装订线类可用于所有断点，其大小与margin和padding interval的大小相同。更改 .gx-* 类的水平装订线，更改.gy- *的垂直 .gy-* 或更改.g- *类的所有 .g-* 。 .g-0 也可用于删除装订线。

trans-unit.source: Gutters are the gaps between column content, created by horizontal padding. We set padding-right and padding-left on each column, and use negative margin to offset that at the start and end of each row to align content.
trans-unit.target: 装订线是列内容之间的间隙，由水平 padding 创建。我们在每一列上设置 padding-right 和 padding-left ，并使用负的页 margin 来抵消每行开头和结尾的内容以对齐内容。

trans-unit.source: Gutters can be responsively adjusted. Use breakpoint-specific gutter classes to modify horizontal gutters, vertical gutters, and all gutters.
trans-unit.target: 装订线可以进行响应性调整。使用特定于断点的装订线类来修改水平装订线，垂直装订线和所有装订线。

trans-unit.source: Gutters start at 1.5rem (24px) wide. This allows us to match our grid to the padding and margin spacers scale.
trans-unit.target: 1.5rem 开始于1.5rem（ 24px ）宽。这使我们能够将网格匹配到padding和margin spacer的比例。

trans-unit.source: Heads up! Be sure to read the Grid page first before diving into how to modify and customize your grid columns.
trans-unit.target: 当心！在深入了解如何修改和自定义网格列之前，请务必先阅读“网格”页面。

trans-unit.source: Heads up! Dropdowns are positioned thanks to Popper (except when they are contained in a navbar).
trans-unit.target: 当心！下拉菜单的位置要归功于Popper（除非它们包含在导航栏中）。

trans-unit.source: Heads up! Dropdowns are positioned thanks to Popper.js (except when they are contained in a navbar).
trans-unit.target: 小心！下拉菜单的位置要归功于Popper.js（除非它们包含在导航栏中）。

trans-unit.source: Heads up! This property has no effect on single rows of flex items.
trans-unit.target: 小心！此属性对弹性项目的单行无效。

trans-unit.source: Heads up! Your mileage with card columns may vary. To prevent cards breaking across columns, we must set them to display: inline-block as column-break-inside: avoid isn’t a bulletproof solution yet.
trans-unit.target: 小心！您使用信用卡栏的里程可能有所不同。为了防止卡在列之间折断，我们必须将它们设置为 display: inline-block as column-break-inside: avoid 还不是防弹解决方案。

trans-unit.source: IE11 and IE10 will render position: sticky as position: relative. As such, we wrap the styles in a @supports query, limiting the stickiness to only browsers that can render it properly.
trans-unit.target: IE11和IE10将呈现 position: sticky 作为 position: relative 。这样，我们将样式包装在 @supports 查询中，将粘性限制为仅可以正确呈现样式的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Mobile first, responsive design is the goal. Bootstrap’s CSS aims to apply the bare minimum of styles to make a layout work at the smallest breakpoint, and then layers on styles to adjust that design for larger devices. This optimizes your CSS, improves rendering time, and provides a great experience for your visitors.
trans-unit.target: 移动第一，响应式设计是目标。Bootstrap的CSS旨在使用最少的样式来使布局在最小的断点处工作，然后在样式上分层以针对较大的设备调整该设计。这样可以优化CSS，缩短渲染时间，并为访问者提供出色的体验。

trans-unit.source: Moved to flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 移至flexbox。

trans-unit.source: Need an edge-to-edge design? Drop the parent .container or .container-fluid.
trans-unit.target: 需要边缘到边缘的设计吗？删除父 .container 或 .container-fluid 。

trans-unit.source: New to or unfamiliar with flexbox?Read this CSS Tricks flexbox guide for background, terminology, guidelines, and code snippets.
trans-unit.target: 新手还是不熟悉flexbox？阅读本CSS Tricks flexbox指南，了解背景，术语，指南和代码段。

trans-unit.source: Our grid supports six responsive breakpoints. Breakpoints are based on min-width media queries, meaning they affect that breakpoint and all those above it (e.g., .col-sm-4 applies to sm, md, lg, xl, and xxl). This means you can control container and column sizing and behavior by each breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 我们的网格支持六个响应断点。断点基于 min-width 媒体查询，这意味着它们会影响该断点及其上的所有断点（例如 .col-sm-4 适用于 sm ， md ， lg ， xl 和 xxl ）。这意味着您可以通过每个断点控制容器和列的大小以及行为。

trans-unit.source: Please note that you are responsible for positioning toasts.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您负责摆放烤面包。

trans-unit.source: Pro-Tip! You don’t need frameborder="0" on your <iframe>s as we override that for you in Reboot.
trans-unit.target: 专家提示！您不需要 <iframe> 上的 frameborder="0" ，因为我们在Reboot中为您覆盖了它。

trans-unit.source: Pro-Tip! You don’t need to include frameborder="0" in your <iframe>s as we override that for you.
trans-unit.target: 专家提示！您无需在 <iframe> 中包含 frameborder="0" ，因为我们会为您覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: ProTip: Want equal-width list group items when horizontal? Add .flex-fill to each list group item.
trans-unit.target: ProTip：水平时想要等宽列表组项目吗？将 .flex-fill 添加到每个列表组项。

trans-unit.source: Refactored nearly all components to use more un-nested class selectors instead of over-specific children selectors.
trans-unit.target: 重构几乎所有组件，以使用更多的非嵌套类选择器，而不是过度指定的子选择器。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: Rows are wrappers for columns. Each column has horizontal padding (called a gutter) for controlling the space between them. This padding is then counteracted on the rows with negative margins to ensure the content in your columns is visually aligned down the left side. Rows also support modifier classes to uniformly apply column sizing and gutter classes to change the spacing of your content.
trans-unit.target: 行是列的包装。每列都有水平 padding （称为装订线），用于控制它们之间的间距。然后，在行上以负的边距抵消该 padding ，以确保您的列中的内容在视觉上沿左侧向下对齐。行还支持修饰符类，以统一应用列大小和装订线类以更改内容的间距。

trans-unit.source: Sass variables, maps, and mixins power the grid. If you don’t want to use the predefined grid classes in Bootstrap, you can use our grid’s source Sass to create your own with more semantic markup. We also include some CSS custom properties to consume these Sass variables for even greater flexibility for you.
trans-unit.target: Sass变量，映射和Mixins为网格提供动力。如果您不想在Bootstrap中使用预定义的网格类，则可以使用我们的网格源Sass创建具有更多语义标记的自己的网格。我们还包括一些CSS自定义属性，以使用这些Sass变量，从而为您提供更大的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: Second, we’ve renamed a handful of directional classes to adopt a logical properties approach. Most of you have already interacted with logical properties thanks to our flex utilities—they replace direction properties like left and right in favor start and end. That makes the class names and values appropriate for LTR and RTL without any overhead.
trans-unit.target: 其次，我们将一些方向类重命名为采用逻辑属性方法。借助我们的flex实用程序，大多数人已经与逻辑属性进行了交互-它们替换了诸如 left 和 right 之类的direction属性，以 start 和 end 代替。这使得类名称和值适用于LTR和RTL，而没有任何开销。

trans-unit.source: Sizing on the individual input group elements isn’t supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持在单个输入组元素上调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Source:Flexbugs on GitHub
trans-unit.target: 来源：GitHub上的Flexbugs

trans-unit.source: The .active class needs to be added to one of the slides otherwise the carousel will not be visible. Also be sure to set a unique id on the .carousel for optional controls, especially if you’re using multiple carousels on a single page. Control and indicator elements must have a data-bs-target attribute (or href for links) that matches the id of the .carousel element.
trans-unit.target: 需要将 .active 类添加到其中一张幻灯片中，否则轮播将不可见。另外，请务必在 .carousel 上为可选控件设置唯一的ID ，尤其是在单个页面上使用多个旋转木马的情况下。控件元素和指示器元素必须具有与 .carousel 元素的ID相匹配的 data-bs-target 属性（或指向链接的 href ）。

trans-unit.source: The .active class needs to be added to one of the slides otherwise the carousel will not be visible. Also be sure to set a unique id on the .carousel for optional controls, especially if you’re using multiple carousels on a single page. Control and indicator elements must have a data-target attribute (or href for links) that matches the id of the .carousel element.
trans-unit.target: 需要将 .active 类添加到其中一张幻灯片中，否则轮播将不可见。另外，请务必在 .carousel 上为可选控件设置唯一的ID ，尤其是如果您在单个页面上使用多个轮播时。控件元素和指示器元素必须具有与 .carousel 元素的ID相匹配的 data-target 属性（或链接的 href ）。

trans-unit.source: These tables may appear broken until their responsive styles apply at specific viewport widths.
trans-unit.target: 这些表可能会坏掉，直到它们的响应样式应用于特定的视口宽度。

trans-unit.target: Type:

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, IE10 and IE11 do not properly support auto margins on flex items whose parent has a non-default justify-content value.See this StackOverflow answer for more details.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，IE10和IE11不能正确支持其父项具有非默认的 justify-content 值的弹性项目的自动边距。有关更多详细信息，请参见此StackOverflow答案。

trans-unit.source: Updated grid class names and a new grid tier.
trans-unit.target: 更新了网格类名称和新的网格层。

trans-unit.source: Updated grid sizes, mixins, and variables.
trans-unit.target: 更新了网格大小，mixin和变量。

trans-unit.source: Use media queries to architect your CSS by breakpoint. Media queries are a feature of CSS that allow you to conditionally apply styles based on a set of browser and operating system parameters. We most commonly use min-width in our media queries.
trans-unit.target: 使用媒体查询按断点构建CSS。媒体查询是CSS的一项功能，可让您根据一组浏览器和操作系统参数有条件地应用样式。我们最常在媒体查询中使用 min-width 。

trans-unit.source: When building grid layouts, all content goes in columns. The hierarchy of Bootstrap’s grid goes from container to row to column to your content. On rare occasions, you may combine content and column, but be aware there can be unintended consequences.
trans-unit.target: 在构建网格布局时，所有内容都在列中。Bootstrap网格的层次结构从容器到行再到列再到内容。在极少数情况下，您可以结合使用内容和列，但要注意可能会造成意想不到的后果。

trans-unit.source: Why not use border-color utilities? Each border spinner specifies a transparent border for at least one side, so .border-{color} utilities would override that.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不使用 border-color 实用程序？每个边框微调器至少为一侧指定 transparent 边框，因此 .border-{color} 实用程序将覆盖该边框。

trans-unit.source: Why subtract .02px? Browsers don’t currently support range context queries, so we work around the limitations of min- and max- prefixes and viewports with fractional widths (which can occur under certain conditions on high-dpi devices, for instance) by using values with higher precision.
trans-unit.target: 为什么要减去.02px？浏览器当前不支持范围上下文查询，因此我们使用精度更高的值来解决 min- 和 max- 前缀以及视口宽度的限制（例如在某些条件下在高dpi的设备上可能会发生这种情况）。 。

trans-unit.source: A <button> or <a> can show and hide multiple elements by referencing them with a JQuery selector in its href or data-target attribute. Multiple <button> or <a> can show and hide an element if they each reference it with their href or data-target attribute
trans-unit.target: 甲 <button> 或 <a> 可以显示和隐藏通过在其jQuery选择引用它们多个元素 href 或 data-target 属性。如果多个 <button> 或 <a> 各自使用 href 或 data-target 属性引用该元素，则可以显示和隐藏该元素

trans-unit.source: A <button> or <a> can show and hide multiple elements by referencing them with a selector in its href or data-bs-target attribute. Multiple <button> or <a> can show and hide an element if they each reference it with their href or data-bs-target attribute
trans-unit.target: 甲 <button> 或 <a> 可以显示和通过在其选择器引用它们隐藏多个元件 href 或 data-bs-target 属性。如果多个 <button> 或 <a> 各自使用 href 或 data-bs-target 属性引用该元素，则可以显示和隐藏该元素

trans-unit.source: A <caption> functions like a heading for a table. It helps users with screen readers to find a table and understand what it’s about and decide if they want to read it.

trans-unit.source: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options. If you’re familiar with Bootstrap 3, cards replace our old panels, wells, and thumbnails. Similar functionality to those components is available as modifier classes for cards.
trans-unit.target: 一卡是一个灵活的，可扩展的内容容器。它包括页眉和页脚选项，各种内容，上下文背景颜色以及强大的显示选项。如果您熟悉Bootstrap 3，则可以用卡片代替我们的旧面板，孔和缩略图。与这些组件类似的功能可用作卡的修饰符类。

trans-unit.target: 开关具有自定义复选框的标记，但是使用 .custom-switch 类来呈现切换开关。开关还支持 disabled 属性。

trans-unit.target: 将“手形”光标添加到未禁用的按钮元素。

trans-unit.source: Add .accordion-flush to remove the default background-color, some borders, and some rounded corners to render accordions edge-to-edge with their parent container.
trans-unit.target: 添加 .accordion-flush 删除默认的 background-color ，一些边框和一些圆角，以使其父容器边缘到边缘呈现手风琴。

trans-unit.source: Add .active to a .list-group-item to indicate the current active selection.
trans-unit.target: 将 .active 添加到 .list-group-item 以指示当前的活动选择。

trans-unit.source: Add .active to items in the dropdown to style them as active.
trans-unit.target: 将 .active 添加到下拉菜单中的项，以将其设置为active。

trans-unit.source: Add .active to items in the dropdown to style them as active. To convey the active state to assistive technologies, use the aria-current attribute — using the page value for the current page, or true for the current item in a set.
trans-unit.target: 将 .active 添加到下拉列表中的项目，以将其设置为active。要将活动状态传达给辅助技术，请使用 aria-current 属性，即当前页面的 page 值或集合中当前项目的 true 。

trans-unit.source: Add .carousel-dark to the .carousel for darker controls, indicators, and captions. Controls have been inverted from their default white fill with the filter CSS property. Captions and controls have additional Sass variables that customize the color and background-color.
trans-unit.target: 将 .carousel-dark 添加到 .carousel 中,以获得更暗的控件，指示符和标题。控件已使用 filter CSS属性从其默认的白色填充反转。字幕和控件还有其他Sass变量，用于自定义 color 和 background-color 。

trans-unit.source: Add .carousel-fade to your carousel to animate slides with a fade transition instead of a slide.
trans-unit.target: 将 .carousel-fade 添加到轮播中，以淡入淡出过渡而不是幻灯片为幻灯片动画。

trans-unit.source: Add .disabled to a .list-group-item to make it appear disabled. Note that some elements with .disabled will also require custom JavaScript to fully disable their click events (e.g., links).
trans-unit.target: 将 .disabled 添加到 .list-group-item 以使其显示为禁用。请注意，带有 .disabled 的某些元素还需要自定义JavaScript才能完全禁用其单击事件（例如，链接）。

trans-unit.source: Add .disabled to items in the dropdown to style them as disabled.
trans-unit.target: 将 .disabled 添加到下拉菜单中的项目，将其样式设置为Disabled。

trans-unit.source: Add .initialism to an abbreviation for a slightly smaller font-size.
trans-unit.target: 将 .initialism 添加到缩写中，以使字体大小略小。

trans-unit.source: Add .list-group-flush to remove some borders and rounded corners to render list group items edge-to-edge in a parent container (e.g., cards).
trans-unit.target: 添加 .list-group-flush 删除一些边框和圆角，以在父容器（例如卡片）中以边缘到边缘的方式呈现列表组项。

trans-unit.source: Add .list-group-horizontal to change the layout of list group items from vertical to horizontal across all breakpoints. Alternatively, choose a responsive variant .list-group-horizontal-{sm|md|lg|xl|xxl} to make a list group horizontal starting at that breakpoint’s min-width. Currently horizontal list groups cannot be combined with flush list groups.
trans-unit.target: 添加 .list-group-horizontal 可以将所有断点的列表组项目的布局从垂直更改为水平。或者，选择响应式变体 .list-group-horizontal-{sm|md|lg|xl|xxl} 以使列表组从该断点的 min-width 开始为水平。当前水平列表组不能与刷新列表组结合。

trans-unit.source: Add .list-group-horizontal to change the layout of list group items from vertical to horizontal across all breakpoints. Alternatively, choose a responsive variant .list-group-horizontal-{sm|md|lg|xl} to make a list group horizontal starting at that breakpoint’s min-width. Currently horizontal list groups cannot be combined with flush list groups.
trans-unit.target: 添加 .list-group-horizontal 可将所有断点的列表组项目的布局从垂直更改为水平。或者，选择一个响应变体 .list-group-horizontal-{sm|md|lg|xl} 以使列表组从该断点的 min-width 开始为水平。当前水平列表组不能与刷新列表组结合。

trans-unit.target: 将 .position-static 添加到 .form-check 中没有标签文本的输入中。请记住，仍要为辅助技术提供某种形式的标签（例如，使用 aria-label ）。

trans-unit.source: Add .progress-bar-striped to any .progress-bar to apply a stripe via CSS gradient over the progress bar’s background color.
trans-unit.target: 将 .progress-bar-striped 添加到任何 .progress-bar ,以通过CSS渐变在进度条的背景色上应用条纹。

trans-unit.source: Add .spinner-border-sm and .spinner-grow-sm to make a smaller spinner that can quickly be used within other components.
trans-unit.target: 添加 .spinner-border-sm 和 .spinner-grow-sm 来制作一个较小的微调器，可以在其他组件中快速使用该微调器。

trans-unit.source: Add .stretched-link to a link to make its containing block clickable via a ::after pseudo element. In most cases, this means that an element with position: relative; that contains a link with the .stretched-link class is clickable.
trans-unit.target: 将 .stretched-link 添加到链接，以使其包含的块可通过 ::after 伪元素单击。在大多数情况下，这意味着 position: relative; 包含带有 .stretched-link 类的链接的可单击。

trans-unit.target: 添加 .table-hover 以在 <tbody> 内的表行上启用悬停状态。

trans-unit.source: Add .table-sm to make any .table more compact by cutting all cell padding in half.
trans-unit.target: 通过将所有单元格 padding 减半，添加 .table-sm 可以使任何 .table 变得更紧凑。

trans-unit.target: 在某些实用程序的帮助下，将标志添加到任何列表组项以显示未读计数，活动等。

They can be easily hidden on smaller viewports, as shown below, with optional display utilities. We hide them initially with .d-none and bring them back on medium-sized devices with .d-md-block.

trans-unit.target: 在弹出窗口上添加类。请注意，除了模板中指定的任何类之外，还将添加这些类。要添加多个类，请用空格将它们分开： 'class-1 class-2' 。

trans-unit.source: Added a new .table-inverse option.
trans-unit.target: 添加了新的 .table-inverse 选项。

trans-unit.source: Added a new 576px grid breakpoint as sm, meaning there are now five total tiers (xs, sm, md, lg, and xl).
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个新的 576px 网格断点作为 sm ，这意味着现在共有五个层（ xs ， sm ， md ， lg 和 xl ）。

trans-unit.source: Added a new sm grid tier below 768px for more granular control. We now have xs, sm, md, lg, and xl. This also means every tier has been bumped up one level (so .col-md-6 in v3 is now .col-lg-6 in v4).
trans-unit.target: 在 768px 以下添加了一个新的 sm 网格层，以进行更精细的控制。现在，我们有了 xs ， sm ， md ， lg 和 xl 。这也意味着每一层都被提升了一个级别（因此v3中的 .col-md-6 现在是v4中的 .col-lg-6 ）。

trans-unit.source: Added boatload of flexbox utilities.
trans-unit.target: 增加了flexbox实用程序的工作量。

trans-unit.source: Added custom forms support (for checkboxes, radios, selects, and file inputs).
trans-unit.target: 增加了对自定义表单的支持(用于复选框、无线电、选择和文件输入)。

trans-unit.source: Added dozens of new utility classes for common CSS property-value pairs and margin/padding spacing shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 为常见的CSS属性值对和边距/填充间距快捷方式添加了数十个新的实用程序类。

trans-unit.source: Added flexbox utility classes for grid system and components.
trans-unit.target: 为网格系统和组件添加了flexbox实用类。

trans-unit.source: Added inverse table variant.
trans-unit.target: 增加了反表变体。

trans-unit.source: Added new responsive margin and padding utilities for all sides, plus vertical and horizontal shorthands.
trans-unit.target: 为所有面添加了新的响应边距和填充实用程序，以及垂直和水平速记。

trans-unit.source: Added new .col-form-label class to vertically center labels with .form-controls.
trans-unit.target: 将新的 .col-form-label 类添加到使用 .form-control 的垂直居中标签。

trans-unit.source: Added new .form-row for compact form layouts with the grid classes (swap your .row for a .form-row and go).
trans-unit.target: 添加了新的 .form-row ,用于带有网格类的紧凑表单布局（将 .row 交换为 .form-row 即可）。

trans-unit.source: Added official support for Android v5.0 Lollipop’s Browser and WebView. Earlier versions of the Android Browser and WebView remain only unofficially supported.
trans-unit.target: 添加了对Android v5.0 Lollipop的Browser和WebView的官方支持。仅非正式地支持早期版本的Android浏览器和WebView。

trans-unit.source: Added responsive variations to our text alignment classes .text-{sm,md,lg,xl}-{left,center,right}.
trans-unit.target: 向我们的文本对齐类 .text-{sm,md,lg,xl}-{left,center,right} 添加了响应变体。

trans-unit.source: Added support for flexbox in the grid mixins and predefined classes.
trans-unit.target: 在网格混搭和预定义类中增加了对flexbox的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added table header modifiers: .thead-default and .thead-inverse.
trans-unit.target: 添加了表头修饰符： .thead-default 和 .thead-inverse 。

trans-unit.source: Adding images to the .navbar-brand will likely always require custom styles or utilities to properly size. Here are some examples to demonstrate.
trans-unit.target: 将图像添加到 .navbar-brand 可能总是需要自定义样式或实用程序来适当调整大小。这里有一些例子来说明。

trans-unit.target: 将来还可以添加其他功能,或者自己定制Sass,为其他Sass地图创建级别功能,如果你想更啰嗦,甚至可以创建一个通用的功能。

trans-unit.target: 补充资源

trans-unit.source: Additional utilities can be used to adjust the alignment of buttons when horizontal. Here we’ve taken our previous responsive example and added some flex utilities and a margin utility on the button to right align the buttons when they’re no longer stacked.
trans-unit.target: 当水平时，可以使用其他实用程序来调整按钮的对齐方式。在这里，我们以前面的响应示例为例，并在按钮上添加了一些flex实用程序和margin实用程序，以在不再堆叠按钮时使其右对齐。

trans-unit.source: Additionally there are also responsive .order-first and .order-last classes that change the order of an element by applying order: -1 and order: 6, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还有也响应 .order-first 和 .order-last 那个改变的类 order 通过施加元件的 order: -1 和 order: 6 分别。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, Bootstrap also includes an .mx-auto class for horizontally centering fixed-width block level content—that is, content that has display: block and a width set—by setting the horizontal margins to auto.
trans-unit.target: 此外，Bootstrap还包括一个 .mx-auto 类，用于通过将水平边距设置为 auto 来使居中宽度固定宽度的块级内容（即具有 display: block 和 width set的内容）水平居中。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, while it is possible to also include interactive controls (such as form elements or links) in your popover (by adding these elements to the allowList of allowed attributes and tags), be aware that currently the popover does not manage keyboard focus order. When a keyboard user opens a popover, focus remains on the triggering element, and as the popover usually does not immediately follow the trigger in the document’s structure, there is no guarantee that moving forward/pressing
trans-unit.target: 此外，尽管可能还会在弹出菜单中包含交互式控件（例如表单元素或链接）（通过将这些元素添加到允许的属性和标签的 allowList 中），但是请注意，当前弹出菜单不管理键盘焦点顺序。当键盘用户打开弹出窗口时，焦点仍停留在触发元素上，并且由于弹出窗口通常不会立即跟随文档结构中的触发器，因此无法保证前进/按下

trans-unit.source: Additionally, while it is possible to also include interactive controls (such as form elements or links) in your popover (by adding these elements to the whiteList or allowed attributes and tags), be aware that currently the popover does not manage keyboard focus order. When a keyboard user opens a popover, focus remains on the triggering element, and as the popover usually does not immediately follow the trigger in the document’s structure, there is no guarantee that moving forward/pressing

trans-unit.source: Alerts are available for any length of text, as well as an optional close button. For proper styling, use one of the eight required contextual classes (e.g., .alert-success). For inline dismissal, use the alerts JavaScript plugin.

trans-unit.source: Alerts are available for any length of text, as well as an optional dismiss button. For proper styling, use one of the eight required contextual classes (e.g., .alert-success). For inline dismissal, use the alerts jQuery plugin.

trans-unit.target: 对准自我

trans-unit.source: Align terms and descriptions horizontally by using our grid system’s predefined classes (or semantic mixins). For longer terms, you can optionally add a .text-truncate class to truncate the text with an ellipsis.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用我们的网格系统的预定义类（或语义混合），水平对齐术语和描述。对于更长的条款，您可以选择添加 .text-truncate 类以用省略号截断文本。

trans-unit.target: Alignment

trans-unit.source: All .hidden- classes have been removed, save for the print utilities which have been renamed.
trans-unit.target: 除已重命名的打印实用程序外，所有 .hidden- 类均已删除。

trans-unit.source: All @screen- variables have been removed in v4.0.0. Use the media-breakpoint-up(), media-breakpoint-down(), or media-breakpoint-only() Sass mixins or the $grid-breakpoints Sass map instead.
trans-unit.target: v4.0.0中已删除所有 @screen- 变量。可以使用 media-breakpoint-up() ， media-breakpoint-down() 或 media-breakpoint-only() Sass混合插件或 $grid-breakpoints Sass映射。

trans-unit.source: All API methods are asynchronous and start a transition. They return to the caller as soon as the transition is started but before it ends. In addition, a method call on a transitioning component will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所有API方法都是异步的，并开始过渡。一旦转换开始但在转换结束之前，它们将返回给呼叫者。此外，将忽略对过渡组件的方法调用。

trans-unit.source: All Bootstrap’s JavaScript files depend on util.js and it has to be included alongside the other JavaScript files. If you’re using the compiled (or minified) bootstrap.js, there is no need to include this—it’s already there.
trans-unit.target: 所有Bootstrap的JavaScript文件都依赖 util.js ，并且必须与其他JavaScript文件一起包含在其中。如果您使用的是已编译（或精简）的 bootstrap.js ，则无需包含此文件-它已经存在。

trans-unit.source: All CSS has been un-nested and renamed, ensuring each class is prefixed with .carousel-.
trans-unit.target: 所有CSS均已取消嵌套和重命名，确保每个类都以 .carousel- 为前缀。

trans-unit.source: All HTML headings, <h1> through <h6>, are available.
trans-unit.target: 从 <h1> 到 <h6> 的所有HTML标题均可用。

trans-unit.source: All breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 所有断点

trans-unit.source: All carousel events are fired at the carousel itself (i.e. at the <div class="carousel">).
trans-unit.target: 所有轮播事件都在轮播本身上触发（即，在 <div class="carousel"> ）。

trans-unit.source: All colors
trans-unit.target: 所有颜色

trans-unit.source: All colors available in Bootstrap 4, are available as Sass variables and a Sass map in scss/_variables.scss file. This will be expanded upon in subsequent minor releases to add additional shades, much like the grayscale palette we already include.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4中可用的所有颜色都可以作为Sass变量和 scss/_variables.scss 文件中的Sass映射获得。在后续的次要版本中将对此进行扩展以添加其他阴影，就像我们已经包含的灰度调色板一样。

trans-unit.source: All constructors accept an optional options object or nothing (which initiates a plugin with its default behavior):
trans-unit.target: 所有的构造函数都接受一个可选的选项对象或什么都不接受(用默认行为启动一个插件)。

trans-unit.source: All docs content has been rewritten in Markdown (instead of HTML) for easier editing.
trans-unit.target: 所有的文档内容已经用Markdown(而不是HTML)重写,以便于编辑。

trans-unit.source: All dropdown events are fired at the .dropdown-menu’s parent element and have a relatedTarget property, whose value is the toggling anchor element. hide.bs.dropdown and hidden.bs.dropdown events have a clickEvent property (only when the original Event type is click) that contains an Event Object for the click event.
trans-unit.target: 所有下拉事件在发射 .dropdown-menu 的父元素，并有一个 relatedTarget 属性，其值的触发锚元素。 hide.bs.dropdown 和 hidden.bs.dropdown 事件具有 clickEvent 属性（仅当原始事件类型为 click 时），其中包含click事件的事件对象。

trans-unit.source: All dropdown events are fired at the .dropdown-menu’s parent element and have a relatedTarget property, whose value is the toggling anchor element. hide.bs.dropdown and hidden.bs.dropdown events have a clickEvent property (only when the original event type is click) that contains an Event Object for the click event.
trans-unit.target: 所有下拉事件在发射 .dropdown-menu 的父元素，并有一个 relatedTarget 属性，其值的触发锚元素。 hide.bs.dropdown 和 hidden.bs.dropdown 事件具有 clickEvent 属性（仅当原始事件类型为 click 时），该属性包含click事件的事件对象。

trans-unit.source: All examples featuring navbars have been updated to include new markup.
trans-unit.target: 所有有导航条的例子都更新了,加入了新的标记。

trans-unit.source: All heading elements—e.g., <h1>—and <p> are reset to have their margin-top removed. Headings have margin-bottom: .5rem added and paragraphs margin-bottom: 1rem for easy spacing.
trans-unit.target: 重设所有标题元素（例如 <h1> 和 <p> )以删除其 margin-top 。标题 margin-bottom: .5rem ，段落 margin-bottom: 1rem 为：1rem，以便于间距。

trans-unit.source: All infinitive events provide preventDefault() functionality. This provides the ability to stop the execution of an action before it starts. Returning false from an event handler will also automatically call preventDefault().
trans-unit.target: 所有不定式事件都提供 preventDefault() 功能。这提供了在动作开始之前停止执行的能力。从事件处理程序返回false还将自动调用 preventDefault() 。

trans-unit.source: All lists—<ul>, <ol>, and <dl>—have their margin-top removed and a margin-bottom: 1rem. Nested lists have no margin-bottom.
trans-unit.target: 所有列表（ <ul> ， <ol> 和 <dl> )的 margin-top margin-bottom: 1rem 删除，底边距为1rem。嵌套列表 margin-bottom 没有margin。

trans-unit.source: All lists—<ul>, <ol>, and <dl>—have their margin-top removed and a margin-bottom: 1rem. Nested lists have no margin-bottom. We’ve also reset the padding-left on <ul> and <ol> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所有列表（ <ul> ， <ol> 和 <dl> )的 margin-top margin-bottom: 1rem 删除，底边距为1rem。嵌套列表 margin-bottom 没有margin。我们还重置了 <ul> 和 <ol> 元素上的 padding-left 。

trans-unit.source: All methods should accept an optional options object, a string which targets a particular method, or nothing (which initiates a plugin with default behavior):

trans-unit.source: All modern browsers support the constraint validation API, a series of JavaScript methods for validating form controls.
trans-unit.target: 所有现代浏览器都支持约束验证API，这是用于验证表单控件的一系列JavaScript方法。

trans-unit.target: 所有编程API方法都是异步的，并且在过渡开始之后但结束之前会返回给调用方。

trans-unit.source: An additional function we include in Bootstrap is the color contrast function, color-yiq. It utilizes the YIQ color space to automatically return a light (#fff) or dark (#111) contrast color based on the specified base color. This function is especially useful for mixins or loops where you’re generating multiple classes.

trans-unit.source: As part of this, we’ve changed the CSS for managing multiple background-images on custom form checkboxes and radios. Previously, the now removed .custom-control-indicator element had the background color, gradient, and SVG icon. Customizing the background gradient meant replacing all of those every time you needed to change just one. Now, we have .custom-control-label::before for the fill and gradient and .custom-control-label::after handles the icon.
trans-unit.target: 作为其中的一部分，我们更改了CSS，以在自定义表单复选框和单选按钮上管理多个 background-image 。以前，现在删除的 .custom-control-indicator 元素具有背景色，渐变和SVG图标。自定义背景渐变意味着每次只需要更改一个就替换所有这些。现在，我们有 .custom-control-label::before 用于填充和渐变， .custom-control-label::after 处理图标。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technologies such as screen readers will have trouble with your forms if you don’t include a label for every input. For these inline forms, you can hide the labels using the .sr-only class. There are further alternative methods of providing a label for assistive technologies, such as the aria-label, aria-labelledby or title attribute. If none of these are present, assistive technologies may resort to using the placeholder attribute, if present, but note that use of placeholder as a replacement for other labelling methods is not advised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有为每个输入都包含标签，那么诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术将给您的表格带来麻烦。对于这些内联表单，您可以使用 .sr-only 类隐藏标签。还有其他替代方法可以为辅助技术提供标签，例如 aria-label ， aria-labelledby 或 title 属性。如果不存在任何一种，辅助技术可能会诉诸使用 placeholder 属性（如果存在），但是请注意，不建议使用 placeholder 代替其他标记方法。

trans-unit.source: Be aware of the limitations and bugs around flexbox, like the inability to use some HTML elements as flex containers.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to not use the standard .btn classes here.
trans-unit.target: 确保不要在此处使用标准的 .btn 类。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to add aria-expanded to the control element. This attribute explicitly conveys the current state of the collapsible element tied to the control to screen readers and similar assistive technologies. If the collapsible element is closed by default, the attribute on the control element should have a value of aria-expanded="false". If you’ve set the collapsible element to be open by default using the show class, set aria-expanded="true" on the control instead. The plugin will automatically toggle this attribute on the control based on whether or not the collapsible element has been opened or closed (via JavaScript, or because the user triggered another control element also tied to the same collapsible element). If the control element’s HTML element is not a button (e.g., an <a> or <div>), the attribute role="button" should be added to the element.
trans-unit.target: 确保将 aria-expanded 添加到控件元素。此属性将与控件关联的可折叠元素的当前状态明确传达给屏幕阅读器和类似的辅助技术。如果默认情况下可折叠元素是关闭的，则控制元素上的属性的值应为 aria-expanded="false" 。如果您已使用 show 类将可折叠元素设置为默认打开，请设置 aria-expanded="true" 在控件上。插件将根据可折叠元素是否已打开或关闭（通过JavaScript或由于用户触发了另一个也绑定到同一可折叠元素的控件元素）自动在控件上切换此属性。如果控件元素的HTML元素不是按钮（例如 <a> 或 <div> ），则应将属性 role="button" 添加到该元素。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to add aria-labelledby="...", referencing the modal title, to .modal. Additionally, you may give a description of your modal dialog with aria-describedby on .modal. Note that you don’t need to add role="dialog" since we already add it via JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 确保将引用模式标题的 aria-labelledby="..." 添加到 .modal 。此外，你可以给你的模式对话框的一个描述 aria-describedby 上 .modal 。请注意，您不需要添加 role="dialog" 因为我们已经通过JavaScript添加了它。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to add role="dialog" and aria-labelledby="...", referencing the modal title, to .modal, and role="document" to the .modal-dialog itself. Additionally, you may give a description of your modal dialog with aria-describedby on .modal.
trans-unit.target: 一定要添加 role="dialog" 和 aria-labelledby="..." ，引用模式称号， .modal 和 role="document" 的 .modal-dialog 本身。另外，您可以在 .modal 上使用aria- describeby来 aria-describedby 模态对话框。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to have your pages set up with the latest design and development standards. That means using an HTML5 doctype and including a viewport meta tag for proper responsive behaviors. Put it all together and your pages should look like this:

trans-unit.source: Be sure to use .col-form-label-sm or .col-form-label-lg to your <label>s or <legend>s to correctly follow the size of .form-control-lg and .form-control-sm.
trans-unit.target: 请确保在 <label> 或 <legend> 上使用 .col-form-label-sm 或 .col-form-label-lg ，以正确遵循 .form-control-lg 和 .form-control-sm 。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to use an appropriate type attribute on all inputs (e.g., email for email address or number for numerical information) to take advantage of newer input controls like email verification, number selection, and more.
trans-unit.target: 确保在所有输入（例如， email 表示电子邮件地址或 number 表示数字信息）上使用适当的 type 属性，以利用更新的输入控件，例如电子邮件验证，数字选择等。

trans-unit.target: 确保已加载警报插件或已编译的Bootstrap JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: Because Bootstrap’s components are purposely designed to be fairly generic, authors may need to include further
trans-unit.target: 由于Bootstrap的组件是专门为通用设计的，因此作者可能需要包括更多内容。

trans-unit.source: Because the media object has so few structural requirements, you can also use these classes on list HTML elements. On your <ul> or <ol>, add the .list-unstyled to remove any browser default list styles, and then apply .media to your <li>s. As always, use spacing utilities wherever needed to fine tune.
trans-unit.target: 由于媒体对象的结构要求很少，因此您也可以在列表HTML元素上使用这些类。在 <ul> 或 <ol> 上，添加 .list-unstyled 以删除所有浏览器默认列表样式，然后将 .media 应用于您的 <li> 。与往常一样，在需要进行微调的地方使用间距实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Before getting started with Bootstrap’s modal component, be sure to read the following as our menu options have recently changed.
trans-unit.target: 在开始使用Bootstrap的模式组件之前，请确保阅读以下内容，因为我们的菜单选项最近已更改。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap “spinners” can be used to show the loading state in your projects. They’re built only with HTML and CSS, meaning you don’t need any JavaScript to create them. You will, however, need some custom JavaScript to toggle their visibility. Their appearance, alignment, and sizing can be easily customized with our amazing utility classes.
trans-unit.target: 引导程序“ spinners”可用于显示项目中的加载状态。它们仅使用HTML和CSS构建，这意味着您不需要任何JavaScript即可创建它们。但是，您将需要一些自定义JavaScript来切换其可见性。它们的外观，对齐方式和大小可以通过我们惊人的实用程序类轻松进行自定义。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 3’s vendor prefix mixins, which were deprecated in v3.2.0, have been removed in Bootstrap 4. Since we use Autoprefixer, they’re no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4 在v3.2.0中已弃用了Bootstrap 3的供应商前缀混合，因为我们使用了Autoprefixer，因此不再需要它们。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 4
trans-unit.target: 船梯4

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 4 includes a handful of Sass maps, key value pairs that make it easier to generate families of related CSS. We use Sass maps for our colors, grid breakpoints, and more. Just like Sass variables, all Sass maps include the !default flag and can be overridden and extended.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4包含少量的Sass映射，键值对，可以更轻松地生成相关CSS系列。我们将Sass贴图用于我们的颜色，网格断点等。就像Sass变量一样，所有Sass映射都包含 !default 标志，并且可以覆盖和扩展。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 4 includes around two dozen CSS custom properties (variables) in its compiled CSS. These provide easy access to commonly used values like our theme colors, breakpoints, and primary font stacks when working in your browser’s Inspector, a code sandbox, or general prototyping.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4 在其已编译的CSS中包含大约两打CSS自定义属性（变量）。当在浏览器的Inspector，代码沙箱或常规原型中工作时，使用这些工具可以轻松访问常用值，例如主题颜色，断点和主要字体堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 4 is a major rewrite of the entire project. The most notable changes are summarized below, followed by more specific changes to relevant components.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4是整个项目的一次重大重写。下面总结了最显著的变化,然后是相关组件的更具体的变化。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 4 is built with flexbox, but not every element’s display has been changed to display: flex as this would add many unnecessary overrides and unexpectedly change key browser behaviors. Most of our components are built with flexbox enabled.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 4是使用flexbox构建的，但是并不是每个元素的 display 都更改为 display: flex 因为这会添加许多不必要的替代，并且会意外更改关键的浏览器行为。我们大多数组件都是在启用flexbox的情况下构建的。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap 5 is designed to be used without jQuery, but it’s still possible to use our components with jQuery. If Bootstrap detects jQuery in the window object it’ll add all of our components in jQuery’s plugin system; this means you’ll be able to do $('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip() to enable tooltips. The same goes for our other components.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap 5设计为不使用jQuery，但仍可以将我们的组件与jQuery一起使用。如果Bootstrap在 window 对象中检测到 jQuery ，它将在jQuery的插件系统中添加所有组件。这意味着您将可以执行 $('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip() 以启用工具提示。其他组件也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap also provides a way to translate the “Browse” text in HTML with the data-browse attribute which can be added to the custom input label (example in Dutch):
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap还提供了一种使用 data-browse 属性转换HTML中的“浏览”文本的方法，该属性可以添加到自定义输入标签中（以荷兰语为例）：

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap assumes the presence of some specific keys within Sass maps as we used and extend these ourselves. As you customize the included maps, you may encounter errors where a specific Sass map’s key is being used.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap假定在我们使用和扩展它们时，Sass映射中存在某些特定键。自定义包含的地图时，在使用特定Sass地图的键时可能会遇到错误。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap comes with three different containers:
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap有三个不同的容器。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap depends on jQuery and Popper, which are specified in the peerDependencies property; this means that you will have to make sure to add both of them to your package.json using npm install --save jquery popper.js.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap取决于 peerDependencies 属性中指定的jQuery和Popper。这意味着您必须确保使用 npm install --save jquery popper.js 将它们都添加到 package.json 中。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap depends on Popper, which is specified in the peerDependencies property. This means that you will have to make sure to add it to your package.json using npm install @popperjs/core.
trans-unit.target: 引导程序依赖于Popper，该属性在 peerDependencies 属性中指定。这意味着您必须确保使用 npm install @popperjs/core 将其添加到 package.json 中。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap employs a handful of important global styles and settings that you’ll need to be aware of when using it, all of which are almost exclusively geared towards the normalization of cross browser styles. Let’s dive in.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap使用了一些重要的全局样式和设置，使用它们时您需要注意它们，所有这些几乎都专门用于跨浏览器样式的标准化。让我们潜入。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes a handful of options for including some or all of our compiled CSS.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包含了一些选项,用于包含部分或全部的编译CSS。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes a wide range of shorthand responsive margin and padding utility classes to modify an element’s appearance.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包括各种速记响应边距和填充实用程序类，用于修改元素的外观。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes a wide range of shorthand responsive margin, padding, and gap utility classes to modify an element’s appearance.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包括各种速记响应边距，填充和间隙实用程序类，用于修改元素的外观。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes several predefined button styles, each serving its own semantic purpose, with a few extras thrown in for more control.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包含了几种预定义的按钮样式,每一种样式都有自己的语义目的,同时还加入了一些额外的功能,以便进行更多的控制。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes six default breakpoints, sometimes referred to as grid tiers, for building responsively. These breakpoints can be customized if you’re using our source Sass files.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包含六个默认断点（有时称为网格层），用于进行响应式构建。如果您使用我们的源Sass文件，则可以自定义这些断点。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes support for the prefers-reduced-motion media feature. In browsers/environments that allow the user to specify their preference for reduced motion, most CSS transition effects in Bootstrap (for instance, when a modal dialog is opened or closed, or the sliding animation in carousels) will be disabled, and meaningful animations (such as spinners) will be slowed down.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包括对“ prefers-reduced-motion - media”功能的支持。在允许用户指定减少运动偏好的浏览器/环境中，Bootstrap中的大多数CSS过渡效果（例如，当打开或关闭模态对话框或轮播中的滑动动画时）都将被禁用，有意义的动画（ （如微调框）会变慢。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap includes support for the prefers-reduced-motion media feature. In browsers/environments that allow the user to specify their preference for reduced motion, most CSS transition effects in Bootstrap (for instance, when a modal dialog is opened or closed, or the sliding animation in carousels) will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap包括对“ prefers-reduced-motion - media”功能的支持。在允许用户指定减少运动偏好的浏览器/环境中，Bootstrap中的大多数CSS过渡效果（例如，当打开或关闭模态对话框或轮播中的滑动动画时）都将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap is built with flexbox, but not every element’s display has been changed to display: flex as this would add many unnecessary overrides and unexpectedly change key browser behaviors. Most of our components are built with flexbox enabled.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap是使用flexbox构建的，但并非每个元素的 display 都已更改为 display: flex 因为这会添加许多不必要的替代，并且会意外更改关键的浏览器行为。我们的大多数组件都是在启用flexbox的情况下构建的。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap is developed mobile first, a strategy in which we optimize code for mobile devices first and then scale up components as necessary using CSS media queries. To ensure proper rendering and touch zooming for all devices, add the responsive viewport meta tag to your <head>.
trans-unit.target: 引导开发移动首先，在我们的移动设备首先优化的代码，然后扩展组件需要使用CSS媒体查询的战略。为确保所有设备正确渲染和触摸缩放，请将响应式视口元标记添加到 <head> 。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap only supports one modal window at a time. Nested modals aren’t supported as we believe them to be poor user experiences.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap一次仅支持一个模式窗口。不支持嵌套模式，因为我们认为它们是糟糕的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap primarily uses the following media query ranges—or breakpoints—in our source Sass files for our layout, grid system, and components.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap主要在源Sass文件中使用以下媒体查询范围（或断点）作为布局，网格系统和组件。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap provides .pe-none and .pe-auto classes to prevent or add element interactions.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap提供 .pe-none 和 .pe-auto 类，以防止或添加元素交互。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap provides a handful of utilities for setting width. Depending on your needs, these may help with quickly configuring progress.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap提供了一些用于设置width的实用程序。根据您的需求，这些可能有助于快速配置进度。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap provides an easy-to-use framework of ready-made styles, layout tools, and interactive components, allowing developers to create websites and applications that are visually appealing, functionally rich, and accessible out of the box.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap提供了一个简单易用的框架,包括现成的样式、布局工具和交互式组件,允许开发人员创建视觉上吸引人、功能上丰富、开箱即用的网站和应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap provides custom events for most plugins’ unique actions. Generally, these come in an infinitive and past participle form - where the infinitive (ex. show) is triggered at the start of an event, and its past participle form (ex. shown) is triggered on the completion of an action.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap为大多数插件的唯一操作提供自定义事件。一般来说，这些进来的不定式和过去分词形式-在不定式（恩 show ）在事件开始被触发，其过去分词形式（例如， shown ）被触发上动作的完成。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap provides custom events for most plugins' unique actions. Generally, these come in an infinitive and past participle form - where the infinitive (ex. show) is triggered at the start of an event, and its past participle form (ex. shown) is triggered on the completion of an action.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap为大多数插件的唯一操作提供自定义事件。一般来说，这些进来的不定式和过去分词形式-在不定式（恩 show ）在事件开始被触发，其过去分词形式（例如， shown ）被触发上动作的完成。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap requires the use of the HTML5 doctype. Without it, you’ll see some funky incomplete styling, but including it shouldn’t cause any considerable hiccups.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap需要使用HTML5文档类型。没有它，您将看到一些时髦的不完整样式，但是包括它不会引起任何可观的困扰。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap scopes the :invalid and :valid styles to parent .was-validated class, usually applied to the <form>. Otherwise, any required field without a value shows up as invalid on page load. This way, you may choose when to activate them (typically after form submission is attempted).
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap将 :invalid 和 :valid 样式的作用域范围设置为父 .was-validated 类，通常应用于 <form> 。否则，任何没有值的必填字段在页面加载时都将显示为无效。这样，您可以选择何时激活它们（通常在尝试提交表单之后）。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap sets basic global display, typography, and link styles. When more control is needed, check out the textual utility classes.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap设置基本的全局显示，版式和链接样式。当需要更多控制权时，请查看文本实用程序类。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap source code
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap源码

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap still requires jQuery 1.9.1 or higher, but you’re advised to use version 3.x since v3.x’s supported browsers are the ones Bootstrap supports plus v3.x has some security fixes.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap仍然需要jQuery 1.9.1或更高版本，但是建议您使用3.x版，因为v3.x支持的浏览器是Bootstrap支持的浏览器以及v3.x都有一些安全修复程序。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap supports the latest, stable releases of all major browsers and platforms.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap支持所有主要浏览器和平台的最新，稳定版本。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap supports the latest, stable releases of all major browsers and platforms. On Windows, we support Internet Explorer 10-11 / Microsoft Edge.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap支持所有主要浏览器和平台的最新，稳定版本。在Windows上，我们支持Internet Explorer 10-11 / Microsoft Edge。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap uses npm scripts for its build system. Our package.json includes convenient methods for working with the framework, including compiling code, running tests, and more.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap将npm脚本用于其构建系统。我们的package.json包含使用该框架的便捷方法，包括编译代码，运行测试等。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap uses npm scripts for its build system. Our package.json includes convenient methods for working with the framework, including compiling code, running tests, and more.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap将npm脚本用于其构建系统。我们的package.json包含使用该框架的便捷方法，包括编译代码，运行测试等。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap uses Autoprefixer (included in our build process) to automatically add vendor prefixes to some CSS properties at build time. Doing so saves us time and code by allowing us to write key parts of our CSS a single time while eliminating the need for vendor mixins like those found in v3.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap使用Autoprefixer（包含在我们的构建过程中）在构建时自动将供应商前缀添加到某些CSS属性。这样做允许我们一次编写CSS的关键部分，而无需像v3中那样的供应商混合，从而节省了我们的时间和代码。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap uses RTLCSS to process compiled CSS and convert them to RTL – basically replacing horizontal direction aware properties (eg. padding-left) with their opposite. It allows us only write our CSS a single time and make minor tweaks using RTLCSS control and value directives.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap使用RTLCSS来处理已编译的CSS并将其转换为RTL –基本上将水平方向感知的属性（例如 padding-left ）替换为相反的属性。它允许我们只编写CSS一次，并使用RTLCSS控件和值指令进行较小的调整。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap utilities are generated with our utility API and can be used to modify or extend our default set of utility classes via Sass. Our utility API is based on a series of Sass maps and functions for generating families of classes with various options. If you’re unfamiliar with Sass maps, read up on the official Sass docs to get started.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap实用程序是使用我们的实用程序API生成的，可用于通过Sass修改或扩展我们的默认实用程序类集。我们的实用程序API基于一系列Sass映射和函数，用于生成具有各种选项的类族。如果您不熟悉Sass地图，请阅读Sass官方文档以开始使用。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap utilizes a “native font stack” or “system font stack” for optimum text rendering on every device and OS. These system fonts have been designed specifically with today’s devices in mind, with improved rendering on screens, variable font support, and more. Read more about native font stacks in this Smashing Magazine article.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap利用“本机字体堆栈”或“系统字体堆栈”在每个设备和OS上实现最佳文本渲染。这些系统字体是专门为当今的设备而设计的，具有改进的屏幕渲染，可变字体支持等等。在此Smashing Magazine文章中了解有关本机字体堆栈的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap utilizes several Sass functions, but only a subset are applicable to general theming. We’ve included three functions for getting values from the color maps:
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap利用了一些Sass功能，但是只有一个子集适用于一般主题。我们包括了三个用于从颜色图中获取值的函数：

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap v4.3 ships with the option to enable responsive font sizes, allowing text to scale more naturally across device and viewport sizes.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap v4.3提供了启用响应式字体大小的选项,允许文本在设备和视口尺寸上更自然地缩放。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap will detect jQuery if jQuery is present in the window object and there is no data-bs-no-jquery attribute set on <body>. If jQuery is found, Bootstrap will emit events thanks to jQuery’s event system. So if you want to listen to Bootstrap’s events, you’ll have to use the jQuery methods (.on, .one) instead of addEventListener.
trans-unit.target: 如果 window 对象中存在 jQuery 并且在 <body> 上 data-bs-no-jquery 设置data-bs-no-jquery属性，Bootstrap将检测jQuery 。如果找到了jQuery，则由于jQuery的事件系统，Bootstrap将发出事件。因此，如果您想监听Bootstrap的事件，则必须使用jQuery方法（ .on ， .one ）而不是 addEventListener 。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s .button styles can be applied to other elements, such as <label>s, to provide checkbox or radio style button toggling. Add data-toggle="buttons" to a .btn-group containing those modified buttons to enable their toggling behavior via JavaScript and add .btn-group-toggle to style the <input>s within your buttons. Note that you can create single input-powered buttons or groups of them.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的 .button 样式可以应用于其他元素，例如 <label> ，以提供复选框或单选样式按钮的切换。将 data-toggle="buttons" 添加到包含那些已修改按钮的 .btn-group ，以通过JavaScript启用其切换行为，并添加 .btn-group-toggle 在按钮内设置 <input> 的样式。请注意，您可以创建单个输入驱动的按钮或它们的组。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s package.json contains some additional metadata under the following keys:
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的 package.json 在以下键下包含一些其他元数据：

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s alert plugin exposes a few events for hooking into alert functionality.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的警报插件公开了一些事件，可用于警报功能。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s cards provide a flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的卡提供了具有多种变体和选项的灵活且可扩展的内容容器。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s carousel class exposes two events for hooking into carousel functionality. Both events have the following additional properties:
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的轮播类展示了两个挂钩到轮播功能的事件。这两个事件具有以下附加属性：

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s collapse class exposes a few events for hooking into collapse functionality.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的折叠类提供了一些事件，可以挂入折叠功能。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s dropdowns, on the other hand, are designed to be generic and applicable to a variety of situations and markup structures. For instance, it is possible to create dropdowns that contain additional inputs and form controls, such as search fields or login forms. For this reason, Bootstrap does not expect (nor automatically add) any of the role and aria- attributes required for true
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，Bootstrap的下拉菜单被设计为通用的，适用于各种情况和标记结构。例如，可以创建包含其他输入和表单控件（例如搜索字段或登录表单）的下拉菜单。因此，Bootstrap不会期望（也不自动添加）为true所需的任何 role 和 aria- 属性

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s form controls expand on our Rebooted form styles with classes. Use these classes to opt into their customized displays for a more consistent rendering across browsers and devices.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的表单控件扩展了带有类的Rebooted表单样式。使用这些类选择加入其自定义的显示，以在浏览器和设备之间提供更一致的呈现。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s grid includes five tiers of predefined classes for building complex responsive layouts. Customize the size of your columns on extra small, small, medium, large, or extra large devices however you see fit.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的网格包括五层预定义的类，用于构建复杂的响应式布局。在您认为合适的情况下，在超小型，小型，中型，大型或超大型设备上自定义列的大小。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s grid system uses a series of containers, rows, and columns to layout and align content. It’s built with flexbox and is fully responsive. Below is an example and an in-depth explanation for how the grid system comes together.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的网格系统使用一系列容器，行和列来布局和对齐内容。它是使用flexbox构建的，具有完全的响应能力。下面是一个示例以及有关网格系统如何组合在一起的深入说明。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s grid system uses a series of containers, rows, and columns to layout and align content. It’s built with flexbox and is fully responsive. Below is an example and an in-depth look at how the grid comes together.

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s interactive components—such as modal dialogs, dropdown menus and custom tooltips—are designed to work for touch, mouse and keyboard users. Through the use of relevant WAI-ARIA roles and attributes, these components should also be understandable and operable using assistive technologies (such as screen readers).
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的交互式组件（如模式对话框，下拉菜单和自定义工具提示）设计用于触摸，鼠标和键盘用户。通过使用相关的WAI - ARIA角色和属性，还应该使用辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）来理解和操作这些组件。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s interactive components—such as modal dialogs, dropdown menus, and custom tooltips—are designed to work for touch, mouse, and keyboard users. Through the use of relevant WAI-ARIA roles and attributes, these components should also be understandable and operable using assistive technologies (such as screen readers).
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的交互式组件（例如模式对话框，下拉菜单和自定义工具提示）设计用于触摸，鼠标和键盘用户。通过使用相关的WAI - ARIA角色和属性，还应该使用辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）来理解和操作这些组件。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s modal class exposes a few events for hooking into modal functionality. All modal events are fired at the modal itself (i.e. at the <div class="modal">).
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的模态类公开了一些事件，可以挂接到模态功能上。所有模态事件都会向模态本身触发（即，在 <div class="modal"> ）。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s plugins don’t fall back particularly gracefully when JavaScript is disabled. If you care about the user experience in this case, use <noscript> to explain the situation (and how to re-enable JavaScript) to your users, and/or add your own custom fallbacks.
trans-unit.target: 禁用JavaScript时，Bootstrap的插件不会特别优雅地回退。如果您在这种情况下关心用户体验，请使用 <noscript> 向用户解释这种情况（以及如何重新启用JavaScript），和/或添加您自己的自定义后备。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s resizing engine responsively scales common CSS properties to better utilize available space across viewports and devices.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的大小调整引擎可响应地缩放通用CSS属性，以更好地利用视口和设备之间的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s side project RFS is a unit resizing engine which was initially developed to resize font sizes (hence its abbreviation for Responsive Font Sizes). Nowadays RFS is capable of rescaling most CSS properties with unit values like margin, padding, border-radius, or even box-shadow.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的辅助项目RFS是一个单元大小调整引擎，最初是为了调整字体大小而开发的（因此缩写为Responsive Font Sizes）。如今，RFS能够使用诸如 margin ， padding ， border-radius 甚至 box-shadow 之类的单位值来缩放大多数CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap’s styling and layout can be applied to a wide range of markup structures. This documentation aims to provide developers with best practice examples to demonstrate the use of Bootstrap itself and illustrate appropriate semantic markup, including ways in which potential accessibility concerns can be addressed.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap的样式和布局可应用于多种标记结构。本文档旨在为开发人员提供最佳实践示例，以演示Bootstrap本身的用法并说明适当的语义标记，包括解决潜在可访问性问题的方式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a dropdown menu is automatically positioned 100% from the top and along the left side of its parent. Add .dropdown-menu-end to a .dropdown-menu to right align the dropdown menu. Directions are mirrored when using Bootstrap in RTL, meaning .dropdown-menu-end will appear on the left side.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，下拉菜单会自动从其父菜单的顶部和左侧开始100％定位。将 .dropdown-menu-end 添加到 .dropdown-menu 以右对齐下拉菜单。在RTL中使用Bootstrap时，方向会被镜像，这意味着 .dropdown-menu-end 将出现在左侧。

trans-unit.source: By default, a dropdown menu is automatically positioned 100% from the top and along the left side of its parent. Add .dropdown-menu-right to a .dropdown-menu to right align the dropdown menu.

trans-unit.source: By default, any number of checkboxes and radios that are immediate sibling will be vertically stacked and appropriately spaced with .form-check.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，任何直接同级的复选框和单选框都将垂直堆叠，并使用 .form-check 适当地隔开。

trans-unit.source: By default, browsers will treat all native form controls (<input>, <select> and <button> elements) inside a <fieldset disabled> as disabled, preventing both keyboard and mouse interactions on them. However, if your form also includes <a ... class="btn btn-*"> elements, these will only be given a style of pointer-events: none. As noted in the section about disabled state for buttons (and specifically in the sub-section for anchor elements), this CSS property is not yet standardized and isn’t fully supported in Internet Explorer 10, and won’t prevent keyboard users from being able to focus or activate these links. So to be safe, use custom JavaScript to disable such links.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，浏览器会将 <fieldset disabled> 内的所有本机表单控件（ <input> ， <select> 和 <button> 元素）视为禁用，从而防止键盘和鼠标交互。但是，如果您的表单还包含 <a ... class="btn btn-*"> 元素，则这些元素将仅具有 pointer-events: none 样式：none。如有关按钮的禁用状态部分所述（特别是在锚元素的小节中），此CSS属性尚未标准化，并且Internet Explorer 10中未完全支持此属性，并且不会阻止键盘用户聚焦或激活这些链接。为安全起见，请使用自定义JavaScript禁用此类链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, range inputs “snap” to integer values. To change this, you can specify a step value. In the example below, we double the number of steps by using step="0.5".

trans-unit.source: Cards
trans-unit.target: Cards

trans-unit.source: Cards are built with as little markup and styles as possible, but still manage to deliver a ton of control and customization. Built with flexbox, they offer easy alignment and mix well with other Bootstrap components. They have no margin by default, so use spacing utilities as needed.
trans-unit.target: 卡片的标记和样式尽可能少，但仍然可以提供大量控制和自定义功能。它们与flexbox一起构建，可以轻松对齐并与其他Bootstrap组件很好地混合。它们默认情况下没有 margin ，因此请根据需要使用间距实用程序。

trans-unit.source: Cards assume no specific width to start, so they’ll be 100% wide unless otherwise stated. You can change this as needed with custom CSS, grid classes, grid Sass mixins, or utilities.
trans-unit.target: 卡片没有指定起始 width ，因此除非另有说明，否则它们将为100％宽度。您可以根据需要使用自定义CSS，网格类，网格Sass mixins或实用程序来更改此设置。

trans-unit.source: Cards can be organized into Masonry-like columns with just CSS by wrapping them in .card-columns. Cards are built with CSS column properties instead of flexbox for easier alignment. Cards are ordered from top to bottom and left to right.
trans-unit.target: 卡可以组织成砖石般只用CSS列在包装他们 .card-columns 。卡是使用CSS column 属性而不是flexbox构建的，以便于对齐。卡的排列顺序是从上到下，从左到右。

trans-unit.source: Cards have position: relative by default in Bootstrap, so in this case you can safely add the .stretched-link class to a link in the card without any other HTML changes.
trans-unit.target: 卡在Bootstrap中默认具有 position: relative ，因此在这种情况下，您可以安全地将 .stretched-link 类添加到卡中的链接，而无需进行其他任何HTML更改。

trans-unit.source: Cards include a few options for working with images. Choose from appending “image caps” at either end of a card, overlaying images with card content, or simply embedding the image in a card.
trans-unit.target: 卡包含用于处理图像的一些选项。您可以选择在卡片的任一端添加“图像上限”，将图像与卡片内容叠加在一起，或仅将图像嵌入卡片中。

trans-unit.source: Cards include various options for customizing their backgrounds, borders, and color.
trans-unit.target: 卡片包括各种自定义背景、边框和颜色的选项。

trans-unit.source: Carousels don’t automatically normalize slide dimensions. As such, you may need to use additional utilities or custom styles to appropriately size content. While carousels support previous/next controls and indicators, they’re not explicitly required. Add and customize as you see fit.
trans-unit.target: 轮播不会自动标准化幻灯片尺寸。因此，您可能需要使用其他实用程序或自定义样式来适当调整内容大小。虽然轮播支持上一个/下一个控件和指示器，但并没有明确要求它们。根据需要添加和自定义。

trans-unit.source: Change buttons’ [disabled] to :disabled as IE9+ supports :disabled. However fieldset[disabled] is still necessary because native disabled fieldsets are still buggy in IE11.
trans-unit.target: 将按钮的 [disabled] 更改为 :disabled 因为IE9 +支持 :disabled 。但是 fieldset[disabled] 仍然是必需的，因为本机的禁用fieldset在IE11中仍然存在问题。

trans-unit.source: Change how flex items wrap in a flex container. Choose from no wrapping at all (the browser default) with .flex-nowrap, wrapping with .flex-wrap, or reverse wrapping with .flex-wrap-reverse.
trans-unit.target: 更改弹性项目在弹性容器中的包装方式。选择从所有没有包装（浏览器默认） .flex-nowrap ，包装与 .flex-wrap ，或反向缠绕 .flex-wrap-reverse 。

trans-unit.source: Change it to .row-cols-3 and you’ll see the fourth card wrap.
trans-unit.target: 将其更改为 .row-cols-3 ，您将看到第四个卡片换行。

trans-unit.source: Change text alignment, transform, style, weight, and color with our text utilities and color utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的文本实用程序和颜色实用程序更改文本的对齐方式，变换，样式，粗细和颜色。

trans-unit.source: Change text alignment, transform, style, weight, line-height, decoration and color with our text utilities and color utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的文本实用程序和颜色实用程序更改文本的对齐方式，变换，样式，粗细，行高，装饰和颜色。

trans-unit.source: Change the display value of elements when printing with our print display utility classes. Includes support for the same display values as our responsive .d-* utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的打印显示实用程序类进行打印时，更改元素的 display 值。包括对与我们的响应式 .d-* 实用程序相同的 display 值的支持。

trans-unit.source: Change the visual order of specific flex items with a handful of order utilities. We only provide options for making an item first or last, as well as a reset to use the DOM order. As order takes any integer value (e.g., 5), add custom CSS for any additional values needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用一些 order 实用程序来更改特定弹性商品的视觉订购。我们仅提供用于使项目成为第一项或最后一项的选项，以及提供重置以使用DOM顺序的选项。由于 order 采用任何整数值（例如 5 ），请为所需的任何其他值添加自定义CSS。

trans-unit.source: Change the visual order of specific flex items with a handful of order utilities. We only provide options for making an item first or last, as well as a reset to use the DOM order. As order takes any integer value from 0 to 5, add custom CSS for any additional values needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用一些 order 工具来更改特定弹性商品的视觉订购。我们仅提供用于使项目成为第一项或最后一项的选项，以及提供重置以使用DOM顺序的选项。当 order 接受从0到5的任何整数值时，请为所需的任何其他值添加自定义CSS。

trans-unit.source: Change the alignment of elements with the vertical-alignment utilities. Please note that vertical-align only affects inline, inline-block, inline-table, and table cell elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 vertical-alignment 工具更改元素的对齐方式。请注意，垂直对齐仅影响内联，内联块，内联表和表单元格元素。

trans-unit.source: Change the alignment of pagination components with flexbox utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox实用程序更改分页组件的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Change the border color using utilities built on our theme colors.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立在我们主题颜色上的实用工具改变边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Change the default .btn-close to be white with the .btn-close-white class. This class uses the filter property to invert the background-image.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .btn-close-white 类将默认的 .btn-close 更改为白色。此类使用 filter 属性来反转 background-image 。

trans-unit.source: Change the gutters
trans-unit.target: 换水槽

trans-unit.source: Change the horizontal alignment of your nav with flexbox utilities. By default, navs are left-aligned, but you can easily change them to center or right aligned.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox实用程序更改导航的水平对齐方式。默认情况下，导航是左对齐的，但是您可以轻松地将它们更改为居中或右对齐。

trans-unit.source: Change the line height with .lh-* utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .lh-* 实用程序更改行高。

trans-unit.source: Change the order of content in media objects by modifying the HTML itself, or by adding some custom flexbox CSS to set the order property (to an integer of your choosing).
trans-unit.target: 通过修改HTML本身或添加一些自定义flexbox CSS设置 order 属性（更改为您选择的整数），可以更改媒体对象中内容的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Change the style of .navs component with modifiers and utilities. Mix and match as needed, or build your own.
trans-unit.target: 使用修饰符和实用程序更改 .nav 组件的样式。根据需要混合和匹配，或构建自己的。

trans-unit.source: Change the value of the display property with our responsive display utility classes. We purposely support only a subset of all possible values for display. Classes can be combined for various effects as you need.
trans-unit.target: 使用我们的响应式显示实用程序类更改 display 属性的值。我们特意仅支持 display 所有可能值的子集。您可以根据需要组合类以实现各种效果。

trans-unit.source: Change the way in which the content is selected when the user interacts with it.

trans-unit.target: 改变过渡时间

trans-unit.source: Changed grid system media query breakpoints and container widths to account for new grid tier and ensure columns are evenly divisible by 12 at their max width.
trans-unit.target: 更改了网格系统媒体查询的断点和容器宽度，以考虑新的网格层，并确保列的最大宽度被 12 整除。

trans-unit.source: Changed the color-yiq from a mixin that included the color property to a function that returns a value, allowing you to use it for any CSS property. For example, instead of color-yiq(#000), you’d write color: color-yiq(#000);.
trans-unit.target: 将 color-yiq 从包括 color 属性的mixin 更改为一个返回值的函数，使您可以将其用于任何CSS属性。例如，而不是 color-yiq(#000) ，你会写 color: color-yiq(#000); 。

trans-unit.source: Checkboxes
trans-unit.target: Checkboxes

trans-unit.source: Checkboxes and radio buttons support HTML-based form validation and provide concise, accessible labels. As such, our <input>s and <label>s are sibling elements as opposed to an <input> within a <label>. This is slightly more verbose as you must specify id and for attributes to relate the <input> and <label>.
trans-unit.target: 复选框和单选按钮支持基于HTML的表单验证，并提供简洁，可访问的标签。因此，我们的 <input> S和 <label> s的兄弟元素，而不是一个 <input> 一个内 <label> 。这是稍微详细为您必须指定 id ，并 for 属性相关的 <input> 和 <label> 。

trans-unit.source: Classes are used throughout, so your markup can be super flexible. Use <ul>s like above, <ol> if the order of your items is important, or roll your own with a <nav> element. Because the .nav uses display: flex, the nav links behave the same as nav items would, but without the extra markup.
trans-unit.target: 整个过程都使用了类，因此您的标记可以超级灵活。如上使用 <ul> ，如果项的顺序很重要，则使用 <ol> ，或者使用 <nav> 元素滚动。因为 .nav 使用 display: flex ，所以导航链接的行为与导航项相同，但没有额外的标记。
