trans-unit.source: Columns are position: relative by default, so clickable columns only require the .stretched-link class on a link. However, stretching a link over an entire .row requires .position-static on the column and .position-relative on the row.
trans-unit.target: 列是 position: relative 默认情况下是相对的，因此可单击的列仅需要 .stretched-link 上的.stretched-link类。但是，在整个 .row 上扩展链接需要在列上使用 .position-static ， .position-relative 上使用.position-relative。

trans-unit.source: Columns have horizontal padding to create the gutters between individual columns, however, you can remove the margin from rows and padding from columns with .no-gutters on the .row.
trans-unit.target: 列具有水平 padding 创建单独的列之间的排水沟，然而，你可以删除 margin 从行和 padding 从列 .no-gutters 上 .row 。

trans-unit.target: 合并 .label 和 .badge 消除歧义从 <label> 元件和简化相关的组件。

trans-unit.source: Container max-width
trans-unit.target: 容器 max-width

trans-unit.source: Containers
trans-unit.target: Containers

trans-unit.source: Containers are a fundamental building block of Bootstrap that contain, pad, and align your content within a given device or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 容器是Bootstrap的一个基本构件,它可以在给定的设备或视口中包含、填充和对齐你的内容。

trans-unit.source: Containers are the most basic layout element in Bootstrap and are required when using our default grid system. Containers are used to contain, pad, and (sometimes) center the content within them. While containers can be nested, most layouts do not require a nested container.
trans-unit.target: 容器是Bootstrap中最基本的布局元素，在使用我们的默认网格系统时，容器是必需的。容器用于在其中容纳，填充和（有时）使内容居中。尽管可以嵌套容器，但是大多数布局不需要嵌套容器。

trans-unit.source: Containers provide a means to center and horizontally pad your site’s contents. Use .container for a responsive pixel width or .container-fluid for width: 100% across all viewport and device sizes.
trans-unit.target: 容器提供了一种使您的网站内容居中和水平填充的方法。使用 .container 用于响应像素宽度或 .container-fluid 为 width: 100% 在所有视口和设备尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Content
trans-unit.target: Content

trans-unit.source: Content types
trans-unit.target: 内容类型

trans-unit.source: Content which should be visually hidden, but remain accessible to assistive technologies such as screen readers, can be styled using the .sr-only class. This can be useful in situations where additional visual information or cues (such as meaning denoted through the use of color) need to also be conveyed to non-visual users.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 .sr-only 类设置应在视觉上隐藏但仍可供诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术访问的内容。这在需要将其他视觉信息或提示（例如通过使用颜色表示的含义）也需要传达给非视觉用户的情况下很有用。

trans-unit.source: Content which should be visually hidden, but remain accessible to assistive technologies such as screen readers, can be styled using the .visually-hidden class. This can be useful in situations where additional visual information or cues (such as meaning denoted through the use of color) need to also be conveyed to non-visual users.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 .visually-hidden 类设置应在视觉上隐藏但仍可供诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术访问的内容。这在需要将其他视觉信息或提示（例如通过使用颜色表示的含义）也需要传达给非视觉用户的情况下很有用。

trans-unit.source: Contents
trans-unit.target: Contents

trans-unit.source: Contextual classes
trans-unit.target: 情境类

trans-unit.source: Contextual classes also work with .list-group-item-action. Note the addition of the hover styles here not present in the previous example. Also supported is the .active state; apply it to indicate an active selection on a contextual list group item.
trans-unit.target: 上下文类也可以与 .list-group-item-action 一起使用。请注意，此处的悬停样式没有在前面的示例中提供。还支持 .active 状态。应用它以指示上下文列表组项上的活动选择。

trans-unit.source: Contextual text classes also work well on anchors with the provided hover and focus states. Note that the .text-white and .text-muted class has no additional link styling beyond underline.
trans-unit.target: 上下文文本类在具有提供的悬停和焦点状态的锚点上也可以很好地工作。请注意， .text-white 和 .text-muted 类除下划线外没有其他链接样式。

trans-unit.source: Contextual variations
trans-unit.target: 背景变化

trans-unit.source: Control the visibility of elements, without modifying their display, with visibility utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用可见性工具控制元素的可见性,而不修改它们的显示。

trans-unit.source: Control the visibility, without modifying the display, of elements with visibility utilities.
trans-unit.target: 使用可见性实用程序控制元素的可见性,而不修改显示。

trans-unit.source: Controls only appear inline in viewports that are at least 576px wide to account for narrow viewports on mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 控件仅在宽度至少为576像素的视口中内嵌显示，以解决移动设备上的视口狭窄的问题。

trans-unit.source: Controls and input groups receive width: auto to override the Bootstrap default width: 100%.
trans-unit.target: 控件和输入组接收 width: auto 以覆盖Bootstrap默认 width: 100% 。

trans-unit.source: Controls are display: flex, collapsing any HTML white space and allowing you to provide alignment control with spacing and flexbox utilities.
trans-unit.target: display: flex 控件：flex，折叠任何HTML空格，并允许您提供带有空格和flexbox实用程序的对齐控件。

trans-unit.source: Convey meaning through color with a handful of color utility classes. Includes support for styling links with hover states, too.
trans-unit.target: 使用少量的颜色实用类,通过颜色传达意义。还包括对具有悬停状态的样式链接的支持。

trans-unit.source: Conveying meaning to assistive technologies
trans-unit.target: 传达辅助技术的意义

trans-unit.source: Copy-paste the stylesheet <link> into your <head> before all other stylesheets to load our CSS.
trans-unit.target: 将样式表 <link> 复制粘贴到您的 <head> 中,然后再粘贴所有其他样式表以加载CSS。

trans-unit.source: Core concepts
trans-unit.target: 核心概念

trans-unit.source: Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros.
trans-unit.target: Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum.Cras justo odio,dapibus ac facilis in,egestas eget quam.Cras justo odio,dapibus ac facilisis in,egestas eget quam.Morbi leo risus,porta ac consectetur ac,vestibulum at eros。

trans-unit.source: Create a modal with a single line of JavaScript:
trans-unit.target: 用一行JavaScript创建一个模态。

trans-unit.source: Create block level buttons—those that span the full width of a parent—by adding .btn-block.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加 .btn-block 来创建块级按钮（跨越父级的整个宽度的按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Create custom <input type="range"> controls with .custom-range. The track (the background) and thumb (the value) are both styled to appear the same across browsers. As only IE and Firefox support “filling” their track from the left or right of the thumb as a means to visually indicate progress, we do not currently support it.
trans-unit.target: 使用 .custom-range 创建自定义 <input type="range"> 控件。轨道（背景）和拇指（值）的样式都在浏览器中显示为相同。由于只有IE和Firefox支持从拇指的左侧或右侧“填充”其轨迹，以可视方式指示进度，因此我们目前不支持。

trans-unit.source: Create equal-width columns that span multiple lines by inserting a .w-100 where you want the columns to break to a new line. Make the breaks responsive by mixing .w-100 with some responsive display utilities.
trans-unit.target: 通过插入 .w-100 来创建跨越多行的等宽列，在该行中您希望列换行到新行。通过将 .w-100 与一些响应性显示实用程序混合在一起，使响应具有响应性。

trans-unit.source: Create horizontal forms with the grid by adding the .row class to form groups and using the .col-*-* classes to specify the width of your labels and controls. Be sure to add .col-form-label to your <label>s as well so they’re vertically centered with their associated form controls.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .row 类添加到表单组，并使用 .col-*-* 类指定标签和控件的宽度，使用网格创建水平表单。确保将 .col-form-label 也添加到 <label> 中,以使它们与相关的表单控件垂直居中。

trans-unit.source: Create lists of content in a card with a flush list group.
trans-unit.target: 在卡片中创建内容的列表,并设置齐列表组。

trans-unit.source: Create responsive stacks of full-width, “block buttons” like those in Bootstrap 4 with a mix of our display and gap utilities. By using utilities instead of button specific classes, we have much greater control over spacing, alignment, and responsive behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 混合使用我们的显示和间隙实用程序，创建与Bootstrap 4中类似的全宽度“阻止按钮”响应式堆栈。通过使用实用程序而不是按钮特定的类，我们可以更好地控制间距，对齐方式和响应行为。

trans-unit.source: Create responsive tables by wrapping any .table with .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl}, making the table scroll horizontally at each max-width breakpoint of up to (but not including) 576px, 768px, 992px, and 1120px, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 通过用 .table-responsive{-sm|-md|-lg|-xl} 包装任何 .table 来创建响应表，使该表在每个 max-width 断点处（最多（但不包括）576px，768px，分别为992px和1120px。

trans-unit.source: Create responsive video or slideshow embeds based on the width of the parent by creating an intrinsic ratio that scales on any device.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建可在任何设备上缩放的内在比率,根据父体的宽度创建响应的视频或幻灯片嵌入。

trans-unit.source: Creates the dist/ directory with compiled files. Requires Sass, Autoprefixer, and terser.
trans-unit.target: 用编译的文件创建 dist/ 目录。需要Sass，Autoprefixer和terser。

trans-unit.target: 好奇哪些组件明确需要jQuery，我们的JS和Popper.js？单击下面的显示组件链接。如果您不确定总体页面结构，请继续阅读示例页面模板。

trans-unit.source: Currently to query DOM elements we use the native methods querySelector and querySelectorAll for performance reasons, so you have to use valid selectors. If you use special selectors, for example: collapse:Example be sure to escape them.
trans-unit.target: 当前，由于性能原因，我们使用原生方法 querySelector 和 querySelectorAll 来查询DOM元素，因此您必须使用有效的选择器。如果使用特殊的选择器，例如： collapse:Example ,请确保将其转义。

trans-unit.source: Custom <select> menus need only a custom class, .custom-select to trigger the custom styles. Custom styles are limited to the <select>’s initial appearance and cannot modify the <option>s due to browser limitations.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 <select> 菜单仅需要一个自定义类 .custom-select 即可触发自定义样式。自定义样式仅限于 <select> 的初始外观，由于浏览器的限制，不能修改 <option> 。

trans-unit.source: Custom RTL values
trans-unit.target: 自定义RTL值

trans-unit.source: Custom checkboxes and radios can also be disabled. Add the disabled boolean attribute to the <input> and the custom indicator and label description will be automatically styled.
trans-unit.target: 自定义复选框和收音机也可以禁用。将 disabled boolean属性添加到 <input> ，自定义指标和标签描述将自动设置样式。

trans-unit.source: Custom checkboxes can also utilize the :indeterminate pseudo class when manually set via JavaScript (there is no available HTML attribute for specifying it).
trans-unit.target: 通过JavaScript手动设置时，自定义复选框也可以使用 :indeterminate 伪类（没有可用的HTML属性来指定它）。

trans-unit.target: 自定义内容

trans-unit.source: Custom feedback styles apply custom colors, borders, focus styles, and background icons to better communicate feedback. Background icons for <select>s are only available with .custom-select, and not .form-control.
trans-unit.target: 自定义反馈样式将应用自定义颜色，边框，焦点样式和背景图标，以更好地传达反馈。 <select> 的背景图标仅可用于 .custom-select ，而不适用于 .form-control 。

trans-unit.source: Custom file input
trans-unit.target: 自定义文件输入

trans-unit.source: Custom file inputs received a change to their $custom-file-text Sass variable. It’s no longer a nested Sass map and now only powers one string—the Browse button as that is now the only pseudo-element generated from our Sass. The Choose file text now comes from the .custom-file-label.
trans-unit.target: 自定义文件输入收到了对其 $custom-file-text Sass变量的更改。它不再是嵌套的Sass映射，现在仅支持一个字符串 Browse 按钮，因为它现在是从Sass生成的唯一伪元素。在 Choose file 文本，现在来自 .custom-file-label 。

trans-unit.source: Custom form controls and selects are also supported.
trans-unit.target: 还支持自定义表单控件和选择。

trans-unit.source: Customize your toasts by removing sub-components, tweaking with utilities, or adding your own markup. Here we’ve created a simpler toast by removing the default .toast-header, adding a custom hide icon from Bootstrap Icons, and using some flexbox utilities to adjust the layout.
trans-unit.target: 通过删除子组件，使用实用程序进行调整或添加自己的标记来自定义吐司。在这里，我们通过删除默认的 .toast-header ，从Bootstrap Icons中添加自定义隐藏图标以及使用一些flexbox实用程序来调整布局，来创建一个更简单的吐司。

trans-unit.source: Developers should use the keyword bootstrap on packages which modify or add to the functionality of Bootstrap when distributing through npm or similar delivery mechanisms for maximum discoverability.
